item.title: self-service web for workflow sofware
item.description: At Caperio me and my team developed a new self service portal. It was an R & D project to provide an interface to workflow software. As part of this I added content to the nodejs api and implemented the design evolved in close collaboration with both interaction designer and backend programmers. Challenges and technical aspects: fullstack development pioneer project evolving design
